	Install, configure, maintain, and monitor on-premises and cloud-based servers, firewalls, and IT infrastructure.

	Manage telephone and communication systems internally or through external service providers.

	Perform scripting and light programming to support system administration and automation.
	Ensure compliance with internal IT policies, security standards, and best practices.

	Minimum of 6 years of hands-on experience in IT administration, system support, or infrastructure management.
	Strong expertise in enterprise system and network administration.
	Proven experience with Active Directory, Microsoft 365, Intune, and server environments.
	Solid understanding of networking concepts, firewalls, and security protocols.
	Strong customer support and communication skills.
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
	High level of professionalism, integrity, and attention to detail.


Method of Application&nbsp;

IT Support Engineer Job at ICS Outsourcing Limited

Job Position: IT Support Engineer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Information Technology & Infrastructure / Corporate Services

Job Summary


	Our client is seeking a highly experienced IT Support Engineer to oversee and manage enterprise IT systems, network infrastructure, end-user support, hardware, and surveillance systems across multiple locations.
	The role requires ensuring system reliability, security, and optimal performance at all times.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Install, configure, maintain, and monitor on-premises and cloud-based servers, firewalls, and IT infrastructure.
	Administer and manage Active Directory, Microsoft 365, and Intune environments.
	Ensure system security, backups, patch management, and disaster recovery processes.
	Design, install, maintain, and upgrade network systems and infrastructure to ensure optimal performance.
	Troubleshoot and resolve network, system, and connectivity issues promptly.
	Provide IT support and technical guidance to employees across all departments and branches.
	Manage IT support tools, help-desk operations, and user access controls.
	Oversee the installation, maintenance, and repair of IT hardware including laptops, desktops, printers, UPS devices, and related equipment.
	Manage telephone and communication systems internally or through external service providers.
	Assess, monitor, and maintain surveillance systems across all company locations.
	Perform scripting and light programming to support system administration and automation.
	Ensure compliance with internal IT policies, security standards, and best practices.


Requirements


	BSc/HND in a related field.
	Minimum of 6 years of hands-on experience in IT administration, system support, or infrastructure management.
	Strong expertise in enterprise system and network administration.
	Proven experience with Active Directory, Microsoft 365, Intune, and server environments.
	Solid understanding of networking concepts, firewalls, and security protocols.
	Strong customer support and communication skills.
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
	High level of professionalism, integrity, and attention to detail.


Method of Application

Accountant Job at Excel and Grace Consulting




        
    

        
        Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant
     

            
    



Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a qualified Accountant to manage our financial activities
	The ideal candidate will be a Chartered Accountant with experience in taxation and strong financial management skills.
	This role requires a mature, professional individual who can maintain accuracy, integrity, and efficiency in all accounting operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage day-to-day accounting activities which is including bookkeeping, ledger maintenance, and financial reporting.
	Prepare accurate monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and manage tax filing and documentation.
	Monitor and manage cash flow, budgets, and financial forecasts.
	Conduct internal audits and maintain proper financial controls.
	Collaborate with management to provide financial insights that support business decisions.
	Oversee accounts payable and receivable, ensuring timely and accurate transactions.


Key Requirements


	Professional qualification in Accounting (ACA, ACCA, or equivalent preferred).
	2 - 3 years of relevant work experience.
	Must be chartered in Accounting.
	Proven experience in taxation and accounting for production or bakery operations.
	Proven experience in accounting, preferably in a production environment.
	Strong knowledge of taxation, financial reporting, and compliance.
	Attention to detail, analytical mindset, and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Preferably a married female candidate.
	Demonstrates maturity in age and personality, with strong ethical standards.


Salary
N250,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: hr@eandg.com.ng, eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "description": "Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

	The Facility Manager will be responsible for the effective day-to-day management, maintenance, and operational efficiency of all company facilities.
